info.name: Theme
info.description: Work with omg.lol profile page themes

item.name: Retrieve a list of profile themes

request.description: Get a list of available omg.lol profile themes

response.name: Retrieve a list of profile themes
response.body:
{
    "request": {
        "status_code": 200,
        "success": true
    },
    "response": {

}",

request.description: Get information about a specific theme

response.name: Retrieve information about a theme

request.description: Get an HTML preview of a theme

response.name: Retrieve a theme preview
response.body:
